name: RandomColor
0:
”Alexa tell random color to give me a random color”
”Tell me a color”
”Tell me a random color”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: random color
des: If you want a random color and are too lazy to look it up on the internet, this app is for you! It will give you a random color if you ask for it.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
